page.title: 12ACTIVITIES (MARTHAM)
page.content: Villages which are quite far from towns do not have quite so much entertainment as the larger villages and towns. Martham has got a bit of entertainment.The village has a couple of pubs one of which has a disco. Also there is a CB club which is held upstairs in the other pub. There is a youth club for juniors on one night and seniors on a different night.There is a carnival which is held on the first Saturday and Sunday in July.On one of these days there is a procession of floats through the village. In the Village Hall there are dancing and Judo classes.The local High School has evening classes and the village has Brownie,Cub and Scout packs.
